lines.text: let k , a , b , j , d , n be long integers
lines.code: long long int k , a , b , j , d , n ;

lines.text: q = 2d array of characters with 1000 rows and 1000 columns
for i = 1 to n inclusive , increment i by 2
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= n ; i += 2 )

lines.text: while ( n - d ) is greater than i
q [ i ] [ j ] is equal to *
for integer f = j to j + i exclusive , q [ i ] [ f ] = D
lines.code: for ( int f = j ; f < j + i ; f ++ ) q [ i ] [ f ] = ' D ' ;

lines.text: for integer f = j + i to n inclusive , q [ i ] [ f ] = *
lines.code: for ( int f = j + i ; f <= n ; f ++ ) q [ i ] [ f ] = ' * ' ;

lines.text: for i = 1 to n inclusive , increment i by 2
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= n ; i += 2 )

lines.text: for j = 1 to n inclusive , print q [ i ] [ j ]
lines.code: for ( int j = 1 ; j <= n ; j ++ ) cout << q [ i ] [ j ] ;

lines.text: for integer i is equal to n - 2 , i is greater than 0 , decrement i by 2
lines.code: for ( int i = n - 2 ; i > 0 ; i -= 2 )

lines.text: for j = 1 to n inclusive , print q [ i ] [ j ]
lines.code: for ( int j = 1 ; j <= n ; j ++ ) cout << q [ i ] [ j ] ;
